answers.answer: Sorry but need to know more info to make an informed answeryour choices are from Metforman to insulin and about 40 drugs in between.also reducing or eliminating most carbohydrates will help with BG control

Here is the cold fact, to me, there is NO  best  meds to treat or cure diabetes type 1 or 2. Overtime, even the cutting edge meds nor insulin shots can't even stop the progression of this horrible malady .
Wow you were to the point!  That is why I am debating whether or not to take Medformin???  My A1C is 6.4 now and wondering it is worth taking Metformin?
